name: Fly Punk Bit
description:
Details;

Fly Punk Bit is a 2D minimalist platformer, where you jump between portals.

Once you’ve picked up the basics you'll have to master the art of jumping and flying platform to get through some of the most challenging levels on offer.

As you progress through level sets the difficulty increases, adding in new mechanics and putting all the skills you’ve learned to the test.

Collect achievements by completing level sets and other accomplishments,

Features;

Story Mode.

Highly interactive 2D gameplay.

Sound Design.

Multiple language support.

Steam Archivements.

Voice Acting.

Challenging gameplay based on color changing platform.

Atmospheric music.

Emotional story telling.

Challenging and interesting levels.
